text:
The attached (untested) patch makes jnirelease.sh include CHANGELOG.txt in
tomcat-native distributables.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi

text:
Created attachment 21309
Include CHANGELOG.txt in dist tarball/zip
Fixed in svn and will be in the next release. Many thanks for the patch.
